int _fileDescriptor

Detailed Description

A class responsible for reading on the fifo shared between two processes.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

FifoReader::FifoReader ( const Fifo &  fifo  )  [explicit]

FifoReader::~FifoReader (  )  [virtual]

Closes the file of the fifo.

Member Function Documentation

template<typename T >
void FifoReader::read ( T &  obj  )  [inline]

Reads an object from the pipe. Note that the object must be of scalar type (or it's internal structure be all scalar types), as it will be written as bytes.

Parameters:
obj The object to be read from the pipe.

size_t FifoReader::read ( void *  buffer,
size_t  size 
)

Reads from the fifo.

Parameters:
buffer Destination of the data.
size The size, in bytes, of the data to be read.
Returns:
The number of bytes read and stored into the buffer. Might be less than size. Zero indicates end of file.

void FifoReader::readFixedSize ( void *  buffer,
size_t  size 
)

Reads a given number of bytes from the fifo. In case less bytes could be read, an exception is thrown.

Parameters:
buffer Destination of the data.
size The size, in bytes, of the data to be read.
